root.name: Murder in the Abbey
root.description: OverviewThis third person point and click adventure game features a story highly influenced by Umberto Eco's book The Name of the Rose. Developed by Spanish developer Alcachofa, the game features high quality cartoon-style graphics and voice work.StoryBrother Leonardo of Toledo and his young protégé, Bruno, are sent to investigate mysterious events at a remote monastery's library. Even before they can reach the Nuestra Señora de la Natividad Abbey, an attempt on their lives is made, which they narrowly escape. Once they arrive, they find out that a gatekeeper died under mysterious circumstances and are tasked by the Abbey's Abbot to investigate it, as well as to stay away from the Library.
